about_the_game:
BLINT - Embark on a gripping sci-fi journey where you take on the role of Fred, an engineer who wakes up in a mysterious elevator with no memory of how he got there. His memories are fragmented and unclear, and now it’s up to you to help him piece together the past and uncover what really happened. Face enigmatic challenges as you explore the unknown and uncover the truth behind the chaos Fred finds himself in.




Puzzles - Join Fred on his challenging journey, where he’ll need your wits to overcome a variety of puzzles. Face explicit riddles, where every detail is a crucial clue, and prepare for implicit challenges, where the solution is hidden between the lines, waiting to be uncovered.




Discover the World - Explore each floor in search of clues that reveal Fred's story. Dive into forgotten books, mysterious notes, and audio recordings scattered throughout the environment to uncover what happened to Fred and how these events shaped his journey. Every fragment you find is a piece of the puzzle that brings you closer to the hidden truth of his past.




Short - An intense and engaging experience, designed to be completed in a single session. Ideal for those seeking a quick, memorable narrative that leaves a lasting impression.

name: BLINT

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.0 GHz or Ryzen 3xxx
  • Memory: 8 GB GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.0 GHz or Ryzen 3xxx
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1660 Super
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Recover Fred's memory completely. Solve puzzles, explore the floors, and uncover secrets. Gather intriguing clues and help Fred understand his past. Discover a surprising truth at the end of this journey!
